member.name: M:IPMA.API.DotNetCore.IpmaAPI.GetMeteoForecastByDay(System.Int32)
member.summary: Note: Only daily data is available. {idDay} ranges from 0 to 2, where: 0 - is day equivalent to today 1 - tomorrow 2 - the day after tomorrow
